manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Lincove Takes Luxury to A Whole New Level PREMIUM CANADIAN DOWN PILLOW Our cloud pillow provides a premium plush feel. This Canadian-made down pillow cradles your head and neck with incredible softness and gentle support. This is our favorite pillow. Maintains Shape & Fluffiness 100% COTTON SATEEN OUTER SHELL Bedding matters more than you think! A quality pillow suited to your body and your sleeping style is equally as important as your mattress for quality sleep and overall health. Our pillows have been designed, tested, and proven to deliver high-quality sleep––and we took it even further to imitate that coveted luxury hotel experience. We Are Better in Bed INDULGE IN LUXURIOUS COMFORT High-end quality and luxury design sensibility give our pillows a 5-star hotel feel with skin-friendly softness and the perfect loft to sink your head into. Exquisitely soft to the touch with an incredible ability to maintain shape and fluffiness. Plush Perfection Awaits DIVINE CANADIAN COMFORT Indulge in the ultimate luxury of the Lincove Cloud Pillow. Experience a heavenly plush sensation filled with the finest Canadian down. Embrace the unparalleled comfort as it lovingly cradles your head and neck with velvety softness and sublime support. Revolutionize Your Sleep THE FEELING OF WAKING RESTED AND ENERGIZED A perfect blend of softness and durability, the Lincove Cloud Pillow is crafted with premium materials and superior workmanship to create the perfect cloud-like pillow on the market. Meet The Lincove Pillow LUXURY DELIVERED AT YOUR DOORSTEP Luxurious sleep straight from box to bed. Discover the results of tireless research, where art meets science. We don’t sleep, so you can.
5-STAR LUXURY HOTEL FEEL BETTER SLEEP STARTS WITH A LINCOVE PILLOW

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very, very comfortable!
reviews.reviewText: As an Over The Road truck driver, sleep is a critical component for safe driving. Pillows are essential to a good night's sleep. I've purchased a lot of pillows looking for that one that's perfect for me. I've spent a large amount of money, more than I could afford at times, in my search. I've purchased pillows online, in high end sleep stores, promotional places and box stores. Nothing but junk!Exasperated and ready to give up, along comes Lincove into my life and finally, I've found my treasure at the end of my rainbow.....a good night's sleep and no headache in the morning anymore! It's comfortable, without being too full or flat. It surrounds my head and gives at the right time, holds at the right time and stays with me as I move at night. It's a close to perfect as is possible. It's pricey, but damn worth it! I plan to buy from Lincove exclusively. Thanks Lincove!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great pillow; wonderful customer service
reviews.reviewText: Great pillow!I originally ordered the standard soft. It arrived beautifully packaged, along with a really cool travel bag.Ultimately after trying it for a few nights, however, it ended up being TOO soft, so I called Lincove customer service.Melissa was absolutely amazing, and helped guide me to a better pillow for my needs.It turns out the king-size pillow with medium fill is a better choice for me, as a side sleeper. I just needed a bit more support.The process was incredibly easy, due to Melissa’s excellent customer service. Truly … she made my day with how helpful and polite she was. Service like that is incredibly rare these days. I give Lincove 5 stars for both the product AND the service.The new pillow arrived promptly, and also contained another beautiful and handy travel bag. The king size, medium fill pillow is a great fit for me, as a petite side sleeper.I’ve been on the hunt for the perfect pillow for YEARS, and I think I’ve finally found it. This Lincove pillow is like sleeping on a comfy cloud. Still supportive, but SO soft and marshmallow-ey.I was initially unsure about paying this much for a pillow, but then I thought about it as an investment in my sleep, and it became clear that the price is 100% worth it. After all, we use our pillows for several hours a night, every night. And the warrantee is for 5 years. Normally I replace my (lower quality) pillows about once a year. So this is a very solid investment, in my opinion.I will definitely be recommending this pillow to friends and family!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made and beautiful pillows
reviews.reviewText: Lincove Cloud Pillows are quality, well made, and beautiful. I bought the firm because I sleep on my side and back, but they are slightly too high for me. That said, I called customer service and spoke to Melissa. She suggested that I lean on them when I am sitting down. I decided to sit on them and it is making a difference. They are still in the breaking in stage and I am sure they will only get better. I would recommend using pillow protectors if you sleep hot, plus that is the only way to guarantee the warranty.My pillows feel clean and cozy. I love how they look on my bed. Perfect for sleeping and/or leaning on. Since our needs are all so different, I cannot tell you if this is the right pillow for you, but I can suggest to call customer service and speak to them directly. As far as the company is concerned, I can highly recommend them. They really care and want to make you happy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought two of these pillows and am fairly happy with them. I was motivated to buy after staying at a Ritz Carlton hotel and loved the bedding! I didn't want to pay the price the Ritz was asking on their website, but thought these would be a reasonable alternative. The pillows are very nice, dense but fluffy, and the shape is great. They are not quite as wonderful as the hotel's pillows, but still great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional Quality and Customer Care
reviews.reviewText: My experience with Lincove Pillows has been absolutely delightful, reinforcing my loyalty as a customer. Having already purchased seven pillows for my family and myself, I am a testament to the quality and comfort Lincove offers.Recently, I inadvertently bought the Lincove Cloud Natural Canadian White Down Luxury Sleeping Pillow with a 625 fill power and a 500 thread count cotton shell. While it's a fantastic pillow, I initially intended to purchase a second Lincove Signature 100% Natural Canadian White Down Luxury Sleeping Pillow, known for its firmer and fluffier feel with 800 fill power. It wasn't until after several nights of use that I realized this mix-up.What truly set Lincove apart in this instance was their customer service. Upon contacting them to explain my mistake, they immediately offered to send the correct pillow without hesitation. This gesture of goodwill was astounding. When I proposed to return the mistakenly purchased pillow, they graciously insisted I keep it. This level of customer care is rare and highly commendable.It’s not just the quality of their products that makes Lincove stand out; it's their dedication to customer satisfaction. The pillows themselves are of superior quality, offering unparalleled comfort and support. The difference in fill power and thread count between the two pillows caters to diverse preferences, ensuring a perfect pillow for everyone.In conclusion, Lincove’s commitment to excellence in its products and customer service has secured my continued patronage. Their pillows are an investment in quality sleep, and their customer care is a testament to their brand's integrity. I wholeheartedly recommend Lincove to anyone seeking premium pillows and exceptional service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Best pillows that I’ve been able to find! Super comfortable, well made, arrived quickly and were packaged impeccably! Best thing, though, is that I’m no longer waking up with a stiff neck and I’m sleeping better than ever! Worth every penny, for sure!

amazing pillow! It arrives unflattened and ready to use. It has a true Luxury feel, and helps me get quality sleep. Their pillow cover is also very much worth it, silky smooth and a great way to protect your investment. The customer service team is incredible (Jane) , very responsive and supportive wrt to questions. Highly recommended !

reviews.reviewTitle: Extremely comfortable pillows and great customer service!
reviews.reviewText: These are the most comfortable pillows I've ever used and the customer service at Lincove is top notch!I got a Medium and found it very comfortable but a little too squishy for me as a side sleeper. I called Lincove customer service and my rep Jasmin exchanged my Medium for a Firm right away!The firm is perfect for me as a side sleeper and I am extremely satisfied with this product :)I'd definitely recommend purchasing one and also a pillow protector so you never need to wash it!

I purchased the medium Queen and it is the perfect level of support while still giving me the ability to mold it the way I need (I am a side sleeper). The price was also better than the other high-end down pillows with the same (if not better) quality.
Way better than the feather/down combination I bought first
